name: .magnet
description:
After news came out about the Infinity Facility being destroyed by "natural disasters", Clara set out to find out about the fate of her brother, Cyrus.

Upon arrival, she is guided through the facility by the wise and helpful, Hector, as well as with the use of the MAGOT gloves.

.magnet is a FPS Puzzle Platformer developed in the Unreal Game Engine which was brought to life as our final forge project. We hope you enjoy our game as much as we enjoyed making it. :) <3

- Lunacrater Games Team
